effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a small chance to hit a Jackpot! granting you Clearcasting and 5% increased spell damage for 12 sec. Casting Touch of the Magi always hits a Jackpot!
Set: When you hit a Jackpot!, you also gain Aether Attunement at 100% effectiveness.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gloves of the Arcane Tempest

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Use: Raise your signet to the Light, increasing your highest secondary stat by 7,934 for 20 sec. Your act inspires nearby signetbearers within your party, granting them 209 of the same stat for 20 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

Use: Reignite the pilot light to gain 11,849 Intellect for 15 sec. After casting 3 harmful spells, it unleashes a beam dealing 3.7 million Fire damage to your primary target and 296,207 damage to up to 5 enemies in its path. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Increase movement speed by 150% and allow you to skim over water, rapidly diminishing over 1 sec. (2 Min Cooldown)

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Arcane Tempest

spells.description: Use: Zap yourself for 319,287 Nature damage, gaining 19,664 Intellect for 15 sec. (45 Sec Cooldown)
